verses.verse: In the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> put I my <S%H2620>trust<s%>: how <S%H559>say<s%> you to my <S%H5315>soul<s%>, <S%H5110>Flee<s%> as a <S%H6833>bird<s%> to your <S%H2022>mountain<s%>?

<S%H7563>For<s%>, behold, the wicked <S%H1869>bend<s%> their <S%H7198>bow<s%>, they make <S%H3559>ready<s%> their <S%H2671>arrow<s%> upon the <S%H3499>string<s%>, that they may <S%H652>secretly<s%> <S%H3384>shoot<s%> at the <S%H3477>upright<s%> in <S%H3820>heart<s%>.
If the <S%H8356>foundations<s%> be <S%H2040>destroyed<s%>, what can the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> <S%H6466>do<s%>?

The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> is in his <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H1964>temple<s%>, the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>'s <S%H3678>throne<s%> is in <S%H8064>heaven<s%>: his <S%H5869>eyes<s%> <S%H2372>behold<s%>, his <S%H6079>eyelids<s%> <S%H974>try<s%>, the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H120>men<s%>.
The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H974>tries<s%> the <S%H6662>righteous<s%>: but the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> and him that <S%H157>loves<s%> <S%H2555>violence<s%> his <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H8130>hates<s%>.

Upon the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> he shall <S%H4305>rain<s%> <S%H6341>snares<s%>, <S%H784>fire<s%> and <S%H1614>brimstone<s%>, and a <S%H2152>horrible<s%> <S%H7307>storm<s%>: this shall be the <S%H4521>portion<s%> of their <S%H3563>cup<s%>.
